contest-event.event-date: March 14, 2010 D Midlands Area (Second Section) Midlands Area (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-second-section National Championship of Great Britain (Second Section Final) From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas.
